465980.name: Ori and the Blind Forest (Original Soundtrack)
465980.description: The Ori and the Blind Forest soundtrack features almost 90 minutes of music composed exclusively for the game. The soundtrack was composed by Gareth Coker, with guest performances from vocalist Aeralie Brighton, flautist Rachel Mellis, and oboist Tom Boyd. It also features the talents of a 56 piece ensemble from the Nashville Music Scoring Orchestra.
465980.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
